My Life

Hey, I'm Samuel!</h1>

I'm a developer and designer, primarily of web from Yorkshire, England

A recent graduate of the University of Hull, working on projects of my own, and of the courses. I tend to post on Instagram frequently, though mainly of my interests, spend my time Cooking, Airsofting and much more. You can find me on LinkedIn

Quizmaster

boo

PHP

The building of a web based quiz hosting system, with management of games, in a PHP and TSQL based server, for my Honours Stage Project for The University of Hull, completed in 2020. Built with the Unsemantic CSS Framework, and keyframes animations.

×

The building of a web based quiz hosting system, with management of games, in a PHP and TSQL based server, for my Honours Stage Project for The University of Hull, completed in 2020. Built with the Unsemantic CSS Framework, and keyframes animations.

This project was started in September of 2019, for the Honours Stage project for the University of Hull. Tasked was the building of a site to host and manage quiz games, of which was chosen a web based route. Developed using the idea of a host and participant model seen in pubs and quizzes, it aimed to combine a variety of features seen in other sites and apps to bring about a new, or different experience than what was already available to people.
